p: Molecular dynamics (MD) simulation for all ligandâ€“protein systems obtained after docking were performed to evaluate possible conformational changes in the protein structure. First, the partial atomic charges were calculated using Gaussian09 [ 19], using the restrained electrostatic potential (RESP) protocol at the HF/6-31G* level of theory [ 20, 21]. The antechamber [ 22] module of Amber 16 package was used to parameterize the ligand [ 23, 24], which was described by the General Amber Force Field (GAFF) [ 25].
